Title: Nice Face
Writer: Phoebe Waller-Bridge, Luke Jennings (based on the Villanelle novels by)
Actors: Jodie Comer, Giulia Patrignani, Paolo Roca Rey, Sandra Oh
Plot: A bored MI5 security officer yearns for more excitement. When a Russian politician is murdered, she is tasked with protecting the only witness and soon finds herself on a collision course with a violent and extraordinary assassin.
